scripts.start: echo "=> Server Started!" && echo "=> Navigate to localhost:8080" && echo "=> Enter 'compass watch' for live Sass compiling" && node server.js
scripts.start-dev: echo "=> Server Started!" && echo "=> Navigate to localhost:8080" && echo "=> Enter 'compass watch' for live Sass compiling" && nodemon server.js
scripts.minify-win: node-minify --compressor clean-css --input stylesheets/styles.css --output stylesheets/styles.min.css && node-minify --compressor babel-minify --input scripts/scripts.js --output scripts/scripts.min.js && node-minify --compressor clean-css --input stylesheets/people.css --output stylesheets/people.min.css && node-minify --compressor babel-minify --input scripts/people.js --output scripts/people.min.js
scripts.deploy: npm run minify && git push production master
scripts.deploy-win: npm run minify-win && git push production master
